__comment: Each record represents a single goal or task with its own start, end, and duration.
Project context is derived from file location (e.g. docs/logs/2025/11.json).
A task is considered 'done' if 'End' is set â€” no separate Status field required.
This structure is intentionally flat for readability, simplicity, and easy analysis.
title: ProjectProgressLog
description: Flat log of work sessions where each entry represents a single goal/task.

Date.description: Date of the work session in YYYY-MM-DD format.

Tag.description: Context or category for the session, e.g., 'Coding Session', 'Refactoring Session', 'Design Review'.

Goal.description: Single focused goal or task accomplished in this interval.

Notes.description: Optional notes or reflections for this specific goal.

Duration.description: Duration of the task in minutes.
